concept.title: Example: Simple table with accessibility markup
concept.shortdesc: In this scenario, the topic author uses a header row and the keycol attribute to ensure that the table is accessible

conbody.p: In the following code sample, the sthead element identifies the header row, and keycol attribute identifies the header column:
conbody.codeblock: <simpletable frame="all" relcolwidth="1* 1*" keycol="1"> <sthead> <stentry>Type of room</stentry> <stentry>Price per day</stentry> </sthead> <strow> <stentry>Single bed</stentry> <stentry>$125.00</stentry> </strow> <strow> <stentry>Two double beds</stentry> <stentry>$150.00</stentry> </strow> <strow> <stentry>Queen or king bed</stentry> <stentry>$165.00</stentry> </strow> </simpletable>
